actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing that no person may be elected to the House of Representatives more than five times, and providing that no person may be elected to the Senate more than twice.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits any person from being elected to the House of Representatives more than five times or to the Senate more than twice.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing that no person may be elected to the House of Representatives more than five times, and providing that no person may be elected to the Senate more than twice.
